content: Mi ha detto che preferirebbe non andare.
translations: eng:He told me he would rather not go
eng:He told me he'd rather not go
eng:He told me that he'd rather not go
eng:She told me she would rather not go
eng:She told me she'd rather not go
eng:She told me that she'd rather not go
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
